content: knitted shawl with garter stitch and stripes the piece is worked in drops fabel drops design pattern no fa-402 yarn group a measurements approx 50 x 180 cm / 19 3/4 -70 3/4 materials drops fabel from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 50 g color 522 turquoise/blue 50 g color 161 pink dream 50 g color 904 lavender 50 g color 910 sea mist the piece can also be knitted with yarn from alternative yarn yarn group a drops circular needle 60 or 80 cm / 24 or 32 size 4 5 mm/us 7 or the size needed to get 20 stitches and 40 row garter stitch in a 10 cm/4 square
